suppress.notes: False Positives List of False Positives: https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues?q=label%3A%22FP+Report%22 Things to note: Update org.owasp.dependency check to v7.x.x or remove org.owasp.dependency check then update uk.gov.hmcts.java version which introduces dependency check v7.x.x Note that updating the uk.gov.hmcts.java pulls in other dependency versions which may have cves assigned CVE-2016-1000027 refer https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/HMAN-249 CVE-2013-4152 refer https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/HMAN-241 CVE-2014-0054 refer https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/HMAN-250 CVE-2013-7315 refer https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/HMAN-240 CVE-2022-22976 refer https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/HMAN-263 CVE-2022-22978 https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/HMAN-265
